fields.name: isNewVersion
fields.comment: / Check if this is a new version the user hasn't seen

fields.name: result
fields.comment: Simple pagination - in reality would use cursors

fields.name: baseUrl
fields.comment: Melchior's IP on the local network

fields.name: userCredential
fields.comment: Sign in with popup/redirect on web, or native on mobile

fields.comment: Controller to broadcast shared content to listeners

fields.name: _pendingContent
fields.comment: Pending content that arrived when app was closed

fields.name: mediaFiles
fields.comment: Check for media files (includes text URLs from YouTube)

fields.name: duckTypes
fields.comment: Pick a random duck for captain

fields.name: crewSize
fields.comment: Random crew size (1-6 for variety of boat tiers)

fields.name: crewIndex
fields.comment: Find crew with this invite code

fields.name: null
fields.comment: Crew not found locally - in production would query server

enums.name: ReportCategory
values: inappropriate('Not safe for kids', '🔞', 'Adult or inappropriate content not suitable for children')
harassment('Harassment/bullying', '😤', 'Targeting someone with repeated negative behavior')
threats('Threats/violence', '⚠️', 'Threatening harm to individuals or groups')
other('Other', '❓', 'Other rule violation not listed above')

fields.name: reporterBlockedTarget
fields.comment: did reporter also block the user?

fields.name: allDucks
fields.comment: / All ducks on the boat (captain + crew)

fields.name: hasAttachments
fields.comment: / Check if message has any attachments

fields.comment: / Check if message is a reply

fields.comment: If gifted directly to a boat

fields.name: standingOnElement
fields.comment: Reference to the UI element we're standing on (if any)

fields.name: flightBounces
fields.comment: How many landings before calming down

fields.name: isGhost
fields.comment: / Is this a ghost duck? (needs special rendering)

fields.name: isGolden
fields.comment: / Is this a golden/cash duck? (needs sparkle effect)

fields.name: rotation
fields.comment: Slight body tilt in flight direction

fields.name: break
fields.comment: Ghost ducks are handled with opacity in the body

methods.name: if
params:
companion.mood == CompanionMood.startled ||
        companion.mood == CompanionMood.happy ||
        companion.mood == CompanionMood.curious ||
        companion.mood == CompanionMood.flying
